    big = 0
    small = 0
    if x > y:
        big = x
        small = y
    else:
        big = y
        small = x
    return (big - small) * a + small * b

    big = 0
    small = 0
    if x > y:
        big = x
        small = y
    else:
        big = y
        small = x
    return big * b + (big - small) * a
